odbcdatabase-odbc-missing: The ODBC functions are not available in this PHP installation.
odbcdatabase-connection-error:
There was an error connecting to the database server. Parameters:
* <nowiki>{{1}}</nowiki> - the name of the server
* <nowiki>{{2}}</nowiki> - the text of any error we could recover
odbcdatabase-free-error: There was an error freeing an ODBC result using odbc_free_result().
odbcdatabase-fetch-object-error: There was an error while fetching an object using odbc_fetch_object. Parameters: * {{1}} - the error number from odbc_error * {{2}} - the error text
odbcdatabase-fetch-row-error: There was an error while fetching a row using odbc_fetch_row. Parameters: * {{1}} - the error number from odbc_error * {{2}} - the error text
odbcdatabase-insert-id-unsupported: Report that this function insertId() is not supported.
odbcdatabase-unknown-server-version: The ODBC server version is not known. A default version message.
